Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: midgitte
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera. It takes great pictures and easily fits in a pocket or purse.Love all of the best shot modes, they all seem to work great. Also love the anti-shake feature.. it works great. All other cameras that I have used the anti-shake features didn't work at all.This camera also takes great action shots, even from a moving car!! I would definitly reccomend this product to anyone!

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Natalie D. Crisman "MaMa Nat"
Reviews.Content: Awesome, awesome, awesome!! So small you can take it anywhere and if your a picture fanatic like me, it's a great thing to be able to slip it in your purse take a random snapshot and have great quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great images, controls a little cryptic
Reviews.Author: CravenAMacintosh
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her camera. Does everything she wants it to do. The battery life is excellent.Only reason for the four stars instead of five is that the controls are a little cryptic to figure out from just using it, definately read the manual to access the different modes and such. But I'd buy it for her again in a minute.

Reviews.Title: I love it!  but go ahead and buy a memory card!
Reviews.Author: wjjjww
Reviews.Content: i love love love this cute tiny camera.  takes great pictures.  small enough to keep with you all the time.  my teenagers have a blast easily putting their videos on youtube.  one thing.  go ahead and buy a memory card (the camera does not come with one).i bought the SanDisk Ultra II SDHC 4GB w/MicroMate USB 2.0 Bundle ( SDSDRH-4096-901 ) and it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Paul Schlosser
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it styleish, great zoom, and is a perfect size totake anywhere. I capture all my momentes with it and I will never forget them with my pink casio camera!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Nancy Surber
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. Love the quality, my daughter loves it. Perfect gift. She takes it everywhere with her.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: J. Young "deal hunter"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  I bought it for my 17 year old daughter for a school photography class and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Palliz
Reviews.Content: Great point & shoot, beautiful day pics but has to be totally programmed for night/flash shots. Great video very good quality...........recommend this camera to anyone who wants to just point & shoot!

Reviews.Title: This is a GREAT camera!
Reviews.Author: James Stumbo "oldanvilyoungsmith"
Reviews.Content: My sister has one just like it (but in blue), and I've been looking for a pink one for a while, just found this one.It has over 40 Best Shot choices, and takes great pictures.Light weight & pretty!

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: S. Willis
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty and functional little camera. I love the color and the display is large and very bright, even in direct sunlight.That being said, it doesn't perform as well as the Kodak easyshare I bought it to replace. There is a grainy pixelation with speed shutter photos I take with this camera, and I never had that problem with my Kodak.The videos are another story. High quality and great sound, by far the best video I've gotten from any digital camera. And I really like that you have the option to take lesser quality videos to conserve memory or post online.So overall, I do like it, but given the choice, I don't think I'd buy a Casio again.

Reviews.Title: Low LCD quality, don't buy
Reviews.Author: Sunflower "Sunflower"
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera online because it looks attractive, however, I am so disappointed that its LCD is so blur compared to my old Canon camera. I always use LCD to take and review pictures, because this LCD is so blur/low quality, it made me doubt whether my pictures are good or not. So don't judge something by its look, try it at a store, then make decision whether to buy it or not from web. In a word, not worth the money.

ProductInfo.Features:
10 mega pixel, 3x optical
2.6" Wide Bright LCD
Face Detection Technology
You Tube Video Capture Mode
MPEG 4 H.264 Video
ProductInfo.Name: Casio Exilim EX-Z1080 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Anti-Shake Optical Zoom (Pink)
